<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.LocationFilterScriptInclude</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>LocationFilterScriptInclude</name><script><![CDATA[var LocationFilterScriptInclude = Class.create();
LocationFilterScriptInclude.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    // Function to filter items based on the user's location
    // filterItemsByLocation: function(userId) {

    //             filteredItems.push(itemGr);

    //     return filteredItems;

    // Function to get the user's location
    getUserLocation: function(userId) {
        var userGr = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_user_profile');
        if (userGr.get(userId)) {
            return userGr.location;
        }
        return null;
    },

    type: 'LocationFilterScriptInclude'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>christy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-05 07:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>f6ca90269362c21094e3f15a7bba10fd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LocationFilterScriptInclude</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f6ca90269362c21094e3f15a7bba10fd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>christy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-12 07:38:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
